title: AI Music Soundscapes : 53 Post-Rock Tracks
description: Immerse your Unreal Engine projects with 53 AI-crafted post-rock tracks. Each 3-minute piece is designed to elevate the atmosphere, perfect for game developers and cinematic experiences.
longDescription:
"AI Music Soundscapes: 53 Post-Rock Tracks " for Unreal Engine offers a curated collection of AI-generated music, crafted to inspire and enhance your creative projects. Each track, with a runtime of 3 minutes, is a blend of ambient melodies, dynamic crescendos, and atmospheric layers, making it ideal for a wide range of uses in game development, film, and other media within Unreal Engine.

Whether you're developing an intense action scene, a poignant narrative, or a serene environment, these post-rock tracks provide the emotional depth and cinematic quality needed to engage your audience. Created using cutting-edge AI tools, the music seamlessly integrates with Unreal Engine, allowing for easy customization and adaptation to your project’s needs.

Transform your game or cinematic experience with this comprehensive sound package, and give your audience an unforgettable auditory journey.
technicalDetails:
Features:

 The "AI Music Soundscapes: Post-Rock Tracks " package is a comprehensive collection of high-quality audio assets designed for seamless integration into your Unreal Engine projects. This package includes:

  • 53 WAV Files: Each track is provided in WAV format, ensuring lossless audio quality. The tracks are 3 minutes in length, with a sampling rate of 44.1 kHz and a bit depth of 16-bit, making them suitable for a wide range of applications within Unreal Engine, including background music, ambiance, and cinematic scores.
  • Cue Files: Each WAV file is accompanied by a cue file, pre-configured for immediate use in Unreal Engine.
  • Project Folder: All assets are organized within a project folder, making it easy to import and integrate into your Unreal Engine environment. The folder structure is designed to support efficient workflow and ease of use.

This package is compatible with Unreal Engine versions 4.27 through 5 latest version.

For detailed instructions on how to integrate and utilize these assets, please refer to the included documentation within the project folder. Should you require further assistance, comprehensive support materials and tutorials are available online.

  • With "53 AI Music Soundscapes," you’ll have everything you need to enhance your project’s audio experience, providing your audience with immersive, high-quality soundscapes that elevate your creative vision.

Does music loop: (Yes/No) No

Minutes of audio provided: 159

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, Android, IOS, Linux

Documentation: https://theologicai.com/forum

Important/Additional Notes: Sample V1 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YtII2sZifZc
